articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Data spat: Meta threatens to pull Facebook, Instagram from Europe - Aljazeera.com
articles.description: Facebook owner Meta said it will pull its apps from Europe if it is blocked from transferring user info back to the US.
articles.content:
Meta Platforms Inc. has threatened to pull Facebook and Instagram from Europe if it is unable to keep transferring user data back to the U.S.
European regulators are currently re-working regulation … [+2222 chars]
